review_data.title: Delicious food, great atmosphere

review_data.title: Lovely night !!!
review_data.content: Best Peruvian restaurant in Zurich. Ceviche for food and Pisco sour for drink are must have. Staff also helps you spending a very pleasant night as they are nice and helpful !!! Will definitly come back soon !
